      • setContextDataFromInstance

        public static final void setContextDataFromInstance(Object instance)
                                             throws DataOperationException
        Retrieve values from fields marked as reverse injectable of given instance. There are only limited scopes can be marked as injectable. See Configuration.setReverseInjectableScopes(List).
        Parameters:
